As a student in this course, I have created a learners group for education at [https://www.datacamp.com/](https://www.datacamp.com/). You should all have received an invitation to join this group at Datacamp.

While enrolled you will have access to the 160+ courses on R, Python and other programming courses for 6 months for free.
